title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
**Product Title:** AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - 4000A Peak, 12V Auto Jump Box, 27800mAh, 88Wh Battery Capacity, LED Light, Quick Charge 3.0

**Product Description:**
Are you tired of being stranded with a dead car battery? Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, a powerful and portable solution to jump-start your vehicle in no time. With a peak current of 4000A and a battery capacity of 27800mAh (88Wh), this 12V auto jump box is compatible with all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10L.

**Key Features:**

* Jump-starts cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles up to 40 times on a full charge
* LED light with 3 modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe
* Quick Charge 3.0 (USB) and Type-C input/output for fast charging
* Intelligent protection systems: short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection protection
* Portable and rugged design with metal clamps
* Charging speed: 75% faster than ordinary power banks

**Package Contents:**

* Portable Battery Starter
* Jumper Cables
* USB-C Cable
* Cigarette Lighter Converter
* Carry Case
* User Manual

**After-Sales Support:**
Our dedicated 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you with any questions or concerns.

**Specifications:**

* Peak Current: 4000A
* Battery Capacity: 27800mAh (88Wh)
* Engine Compatibility: All gasoline engines, diesel engines up to 10L
* Charging Ports: USB (Quick Charge 3.0), Type-C (input/output)
* LED Light Modes: Flashlight, SOS, Strobe
* Dimensions: [Insert dimensions]
* Weight: [Insert weight]

**Why Choose AVAPOW Car Jump Starter?**

* Fast and reliable jump-starting performance
* Compact and portable design
* Advanced safety features
* Quick charging capabilities
* Comprehensive accessories package

**Order Now and Get Back on the Road in No Time!**

Please note that an adapter is not included in the package.
